name: Hue Nino Hotel
address: 14 Nguyen Cong Tru Street, Huế, Việt Nam
description:
Hue Nino Hotel nằm ở Trung tâm Thành phố Huế, có kết nối dễ dàng tới các khu vực mua sắm và giải trí. Chỗ ở này có nhà hàng, lễ tân 24 giờ và các phòng được trang trí theo phong cách truyền thống của Huế.

Các phòng tại Nino Hue được trang bị đồ nội thất bằng gỗ cứng. Wi-Fi miễn phí, truyền hình cáp và minibar cũng là các tiện nghi trong phòng. Các phòng tắm riêng đi kèm với tiện nghi vòi sen và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí.

Các bữa ăn được phục vụ tại nhà hàng trong khuôn viên, nơi cung cấp đủ loại món ăn. Để ăn nhẹ và thưởng thức đồ uống, du khách có thể ghé vào quán bar của khách sạn.

Khách sạn cung cấp dịch vụ giặt là. Khách có thể sắp đặt các tour du lịch và tham quan tại bàn đặt tour của khách sạn.

Hue Nino Hotel nằm cách Sân bay Huế 30 phút lái xe.

review.rating: Hôtel sans charme dans un quartier calme et proche de comodités.
review.comment_positive:
Bien situé, proches de rues animées mais ruelle au calme.
Personnel à l'écoute et réactif.
Petit déjeuner bien.
Chambre 2 et 3° nuit grande et salle de bain très bien.
review.comment_negative:
Chambre initiale très petite car une partie prise par le palier d'escalier et salle de bain microscopique. Le lendemain j'en ai eu une autre, plus grande, sans charme. (cf ci-dessus)

J'ai dû payer 50.000 le jus d'orange (qui était très bon) au petit déjeuner alors que l'employée m'avait confirmé (en français) qu'il était compris dans le petit déjeuner. 

Une employée m'a certifié que le bus que j'ai réservé avec l'hôtel s'arrêterait à proximité de mon hôtel à Hoï An ... le chauffeur a fait descendre des Vietnamiens un peu partout à leur demande et les 4 pauvres idiots de touristes (dont je faisait parti) sont descendus au terminus, soit à 5 kms du centre historique ... comme par hasard les taxis attendaient ...
A l'avenir, merci de ne pas certifier à vos clients que les bus les déposeront où ils souhaitent ...

J'aurais mis une meilleure note sans ces 2 désagréments qui incombent bien à l'hôtel.

Gentil n'est pas une profession ...

review.rating: the Hue Nino Hotel proved to be an excellent choice for my stay in Hue
review.comment_positive:
One of the standout features of Hue Nino Hotel is its enviable location. Situated in the heart of Hue, it provides easy access to a plethora of tourist attractions. Whether I wanted to explore the Imperial City, visit the picturesque Thien Mu Pagoda, or immerse myself in the vibrant Dong Ba Market, all were within close proximity. This prime location allowed me to maximize my time in Hue and delve into its rich history and cultural heritage.

The staff at Hue Nino Hotel truly stood out for their exceptional service and attentiveness. They were always ready to assist with a warm smile, offering valuable recommendations and answering any questions I had. Notably, when I mentioned my plan to visit Phong Nha, a stunning cave city located a few hours away, the staff proactively helped me arrange transportation. Their assistance made the process seamless and convenient, ensuring I could explore the wonders of Phong Nha without any hassle.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Es war ein unglaublich freundlicher direkter Empfang. Im besten englisch wurde mir erklärt wo ich hin gehen kann um die Stadt zu erleben und auch was ich mir quasi unbedingt als sightseeing ansehen kann.

Das Frühstück am nächsten Morgen war super schlicht aber lecker und man konnte alles kostenneutral nachbestellen.

Das Bett war bequem und die Bad Ausstattung war überraschend vielfältig für diese Preis Kategorie.

Das Hotel liegt perfekt um am Abend schnell in mitten des geschehens zu sein ohne direkt an einer Straße zu liegen. Diese Mischung macht die Lage einfach perfekt um Hue zu genießen.
review.comment_negative:
Die Lautstärke im Zimmer ist leider nicht so leise, mit einem leichten Schlaf kann man eventuell nicht so gut einschlafen.
Aber nach einem Ereignissreichen Tag bin ich trotzdem sehr schnell eingeschlafen.
Das Wasser der Dusche fließt nicht wirklich vollständig ab, daher ist es am Morgen feucht an den Füßen wenn man auf Toilette geht.

review.comment_positive:
Hôtes extrêmement arrangeants : bagages le temps que la chambre soit libérée, aide lors de la réservation des différents transports (train, bus, taxi).
Ils ont également de très bons conseils pour la restauration et les lieux de visite.
De plus, l'emplacement est idéalement situé dans le centre ville (quasiment aucun bruit).

review.comment_positive: Fantastic value for money. Great location right near all the action but tucked on a quiet street so had a great night's sleep. Very friendly helpful staff explained a lot to us about local trips and arranged these for us. Breakfast simple but quick and tasty. Room was exactly what we needed for somewhere clean, safe and quiet to sleep in-between busy days of exploring. It's not a luxury hotel so don't go with that expectation but it was great for our trip. Highly recommend.

review.rating: my stay at Hue Nino Hotel was delightful, beautiful traditional, friendly staff and prime location
review.comment_positive: I had a wonderful stay at Hue Nino Hotel! The room was beautifully decorated in a charming, traditional Hue style, which added a unique and authentic touch to my experience. The staff were incredibly friendly and went out of their way to assist, even helping to carry my luggage to the room. Upon check-in, I was warmly welcomed with a delicious glass of mango juice, which was a lovely gesture. The hotel's location in the heart of Hue's walking street made it easy to explore the bustling and vibrant surroundings. Despite being in such a lively area, the room itself was remarkably quiet and peaceful. Overall, my stay at Hue Nino was delightful, combining comfort, style, and excellent service.
review.comment_negative: The only downside of my stay at Hue Nino Hotel was the bathroom setup. There was no shelf to place soap, making it quite inconvenient as I had to balance the soap bottle on the water faucet every time I showered.

Thang, the owner, his wife, Quang their son and the two team members helping out were attentive and very helpful. This hotel has 15 rooms so it feels very homely.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Room was clean - not to be taken for granted in my experience in Vietnam so far.

Amazingly quiet given the proximity to the chaotic and noisy night life of Hue.
The first hotel in Vietnam where I could have a good night's sleep.

Staff is very kind and helpful;  upon arriving on a very wet day, I was a bit unimpressed about the way the reception / dining area was set up as it gave a bad impression. Tony reassured me I would sleep well and I am glad I gave him the benefit of the doubt. Another member of staff also offered me a drink upon arrival and helped me with carrying backpack upstairs. Tony's sister impressed me with excellent English and explanations about tours on offer and restaurant options. All in all they really care about their guests. 

Breakfast was simple and freshly cooked every day, it was enough to keep me going until we'll after 2pm. 

All in all the hotel is very good value.
review.comment_negative:
The weather was unseasonably cold and humid, and therefore so was the room. To the credit of the staff, I was immediately given extra blankets upon asking. Some way of heating would make a big improvement in comfort of the room.

The reception area gives a bad image of the hotel. Designing this better would be more suited to the rooms and staff which are the best assets of this hotel, and would make the hotel a perfect place to stay.

review.comment_positive:

review.comment_positive: S’apparente plus à une pension de famille avec les qualités humaines qui vont avec. Tout le monde est adorable. Tres bie,n placé dans une impasse toute proche du centre animé.

We had such a warm greeting from the family at Hue Hotel, we felt truly welcomed. 
They gave us lots of helpful ideas about the local sights and how to work out an itinerary.
The room was a good size, spotlessly clean and the beds were very comfortable.  The bathroom was modern with good hot water. The aircon worked well and there was a fridge in the room.  We slept very well here+
The location was excellent for local restaurants and easy to get to the citadel.  It's also down a peaceful side street which is quiet despite being very near the nightlife.
Breakfast was tasty too!
We hired scooters, with the hotel, to visit the emperor tombs outside the city.  This was easy, the scooters worked really well and we had good advice about our route too!
we loved our stay here and would really recommend Hue Nino Hotel!

The hotel is tucked down a long alley which was is being dug up for pipes etc so if you have mobility issues this is not the place for you.Other that that we highly recommend this family friendly budget hotel !

review.comment_positive:
Das Personal war super lieb und freundlich, sehr persönlich und hat uns einen sehr schönen Aufenthalt gegeben. 

Das Frühstück ist als a-La-carte. Marmelade, Butter und Toast kann man unbegrenzt nachordern. 

In der Unterkunft kann man sich für 150K VND pro Tag einen guten Roller mieten. 

In der Nähe gibt es leckere Restaurants, zu empfehlen ist besonders das Chaleng Thai Food vorne an der Straße. 

Zimmer ist gut und nett bequem. WiFi funktioniert gut. 

Zur Begrüßung gab es einen leckeren Passionsfruchtsaft
review.comment_negative:
Badezimmer klein und kein Tisch. 

Zum Frühstück gibt es nur Kaffee oder Tee, Saft kostet völlig überteuert (für lokale Verhältnisse) extra, 1,49$ pro Glas.

review.rating: Absolutely lovely staff & the best fried eggs in Vietnamese
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The staff are super lovely and polite, we had a warm welcome.  They managed to bring the check in time early by 2 hours as we arrived in the morning of a night bus.  Hotel Located in peaceful area, really close to where you need to be for restaurants and bars. If you don’t have sat nav, look at a map first, so you know where it is. Hotel super clean with nicely kept bedrooms and really comfortable beds.  Breakfast was tasty, fresh fruit and the best fried eggs in the whole of Vietnam 🇻🇳!!!

review.comment_negative: Me hubiera gustado poder hacer el checkin antes de las 14:00

review.rating: L' équipe est formidable ! Je recommande cet hôtel.
review.comment_positive:
Toutes les personnes de l'équipe de l'hôtel ont été vraiment très gentilles. Un accueil aussi chaleureux, c'est rare et précieux ! Nous voyageons avec 2 enfants qui ont beaucoup aimé l'équipe également.
L'emplacement est très proche du quartier piéton ce qui est très agréable pour les sorties en soirée.
La chambre (familiale) était très agréable (très grands lits !).
Salle de bain un peu ancienne mais ce n'etait vraiment pas un problème pour nous. 
Petit prix ce qui est aussi un atout !
Desayuno excelente. La ubicación perfecta. Céntrica pero en una calle silenciosa. Habitación limpia y el personal excelente. Nos dieron indicaciones de que hacer y ver.
review.comment_negative: El baño era un poco pequeño. No hay plato de ducha, la ducha está compartido con el báter. Al menos nuestra habitación.

review.comment_positive: The staff here are amazing. They are super friendly, genuine and helpful. They helped to organize all of our trips in Hue and our transport to Hoi An which helped us immensely. They also accommodated an early check in. Although the breakfast choices are limited, it is the best tasting breakfast we have had so far in Vietnam and comes with toast, fruit and coffee/team which was nice and varied. The room was spacious and comfortable. The hotel is in a great location and the team here will provide lots of great recommendations for things to do during your stay. We were so sad to leave and hope to visit again!

review.comment_positive: The greatest place in Hue to stay. The rooms are clean and have the main necessary things. It is well located, but far enough so you don’t hear the noises of the street. review.comment_positive: The staff are insanely helpful and nice. We are very grateful for everything they did for us, the rooms are away from the main road so it is super quiet at night. We drove the pass from Hanoi to hue using the company style motorbikes, once you arrive to the office in hue the hotel is a 1 minute walk, overall this hotel ticked all of our boxes and I would definitely recommend staying.
Friendly staff, great breakfast, easy to get into town, modern automatic motorbikes available for cheap rental, great budget option.

I will properly choose this hotel for the next time in Hue :)

Breakfast included very good

Thank so much for all your attentions that we particularly appreciate.

review.comment_negative: Their business practice revolves on gouging extra fees through early and late check out, very strictly. Even after observing that the room was already ready and available. Booked via Booking.com which states that there are no hidden charges. This is incorrect and they will charge you early and late check-out fees of 100k each time whether you ask about it or not. I would NOT recommend this place to anyone if they want even a little bit of flexibility with their checkout times.

They only think about money, unfortunately, ruining the image of Vietnamese people.
We discovered the story behind thanks to an honest local guy explaining the truth!
Our experience: we asked to book a bus to Lao Bao some days in advance and they gave us a price. Just the day before, they told us the price was doubled (suspicious), also they didn't know what kind of bus it was (suspicious too), so we told them we didn't want to pay 700k VND each for 3+3hrs.
Since we arrived by motorbike in the afternoon we had not much time and it was also raining. We asked about the bus station, to go to check for the local buses and they sent us to the southern bus station, where we couldn't find any bus (because they are in the northern bus station). They also told us that local minivans costs 400k Dongs one way (wrong).
We had no more time and options so we accepted.

It was a TERRIBLE experience in a local minivan full of people and stuff everywhere, which is absolutely not worth those money. No taxi for pick up, just jumped on a minivan with people going for a tour that left us on the street where another minivan pick us up and stopped again at the Northen bus Station for 30 minutes.
We discovered that the real cost is 120k Dongs one way and it can pick you up in the city Centre. There's no need to wait for you since one is coming back at 3pm. You can also find online very nice limousine buses for 150k Dongs, with pick up everywhere.

What hurts us most, is the fact that they cheated on us, sending to the wrong station under the rain, telling fake info, changing price at last, didn't told us it was a local minivan, and when we told them after, they deny everything, inventing excuses and clearly contradicts their own words. It's not about the price more than 3x that hurts us, but how they become dishonest to get your money.
Just, if you go to this hotel, be aware of the kind of people you have in front.

review.comment_positive: Had everything we needed. No lift though. Staff carried luggage up four floors.
review.comment_negative: Nothing wrong with the property. A staff member booked us afternoon tickets on the bus to Hoi An as requested. However the bus was a sleeper and needed repairs before we could leave 45 minutes later. On the outskirts of Hoi An, the driver put all of us out at an empty field, not a bus station. Two motorbike riders arrived, put our luggage on their bikes and told us to hop on for a ride to the hotel. We were very reluctant but they were quite insistent. We arrived safely but they charged much more than taxis or Grab. Were they friends of the driver? Whatever, I don’t recommend a Queen bus for travel. review.comment_positive: Quiet location down a very small residential lane off another lane means you're close to the restaurants but away from the music, karaoke and noise. Very nice rooms with a bit of colonial style and flair. Very clean. Comfortable bed. King room ample size. Doubles a bit tight but fine. A couple of the doubles had typical Vietnamese windows onto the stairwell. I would .probably go for the king but don't be put off all the rooms are terrific value. Very attentive and helpful reception staff. Whenever I came back from sightseeing or dinner they came from behind the desk and greeted me and gave me a bottle of water. They service the rooms every day, but I prefer not to have this done as it helps them keep costs down for everyone and it saves water and resources. A bit of a strange set up with the shower curtain in my room but I dealt with it. This is a top notch stylish  place for the price.

They have helpful amenities in addition to the breakfast like laundry, motorbike rentals and travel services. Oh and they let us store our luggage after an overnight bus as well as check in at 10am since our room was ready. It felt like home when we came back every night from a fun time in Huế.

review.comment_positive:
L´établissement  se situerait entre le homestay et l´hôtel familial.
La chambre est propre, le lit confortable (grand lit, et bon matelas), elle est grande,  et le couple qui tient l´établissement sympathique, disponible, accueillant.
Je n´ai pas eu à utiliser la vaisselle, comme d´ailleurs ce fut également le cas dans les autres hébergements, lors de ce voyage. Je n´en parlerai donc pas.
Je n´ai pris qu´un seul petit déjeuner qui, ne m´ayant pas convaincu, m´a fait me diriger vers  le "43", un restaurant excellant et d´un bon rapport qualité/prix, situé dans la même rue, où je prenais ainsi mes petits déjeuners et autres repas. Je le recommande.
Sous cette petite réserve, je considère que le rapport qualité/prix du NINO HÔTEL est bon, et je pourrais y retourner.
review.comment_negative: Bon établissement convivial pour des personnes à petit budget, semble-t-il essentiellement fréquenté par des jeunes, mais accessible sans problème aux plus âgés. Compte tenu du rapport qualité/prix, je n´ai rien à redire sur cet établissement.

review.rating: Great stay in clean room in Hue
review.comment_positive: Hue Nino was similar to a home stay and the room and bathroom were both clean and tidy. We were given a map and recommendations of the area, and the staff were friendly throughout our stay. We were also kindly upgraded. Water for purchase by the reception is available. It is centrally located, 25 min walk to the citadel and close to food. Good stay in Hue.

Personnel très gentil et attentionné. On est finalement restés 3 nuits. 
Très bon petit déjeuner. Hôtel bien situé ! On recommande.

La possibilité de louer des scooter à prix très doux. Pareil pour les bouteilles d'eau peu chères

En bref un très bon rapport qualité prix.

Rien de vraiment méchant. La chambre n'est pas immense, mais pour le prix c'est très bien.

Petit détail, la porte de la chambre est opaque mais laisse légèrement passer la lumière. Ça permet de se réveiller en douceur, ça ne m'a pas gêné.
